title.narrative: Strengthening capacity and resilience for women human rights defenders to counter civic space constraints and speak out on human rights issues in a safe and secure way in Ethiopia

description.narrative: DefendDefenders strengthened capacity for 4 organisations in Ethiopia through provision of institutional support in 2021. We also conducted digital security audits for 2 organisations as well as building capacity for 36 HRDs (19 females, 17 males) and journalists in physical and digital security. Through advocacy work at collaboration with other CSOs, at the 47th session of the UNHRC, supported jointly a resolution on the human rights crisis in Tigray. Enhanced safety and protection for 12 (W)HRDs (5 females, 7 males) benefitting a total of 36 people (17 female, 19 male)

activity-date.narrative: Activity was implemented throughout the year with several sub activities, including emergency protection, advocacy and HRD capacity
